title: FS: Lot Of 6 Graded 1912 T202's Including Mcbride/Milan/Shoeless Joe Jackson $old
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: Lot Of 6 Graded 1912 T202's Including Mcbride/Milan/Shoeless Joe Jackson $old
posts.post_content:
Nice lot here-no paper loss on any of the backs, but a couple spots on one of the fronts. The price is $old delivered PayPal friends/family please. That's less than 50 dollars each for 5 and 115 for the McBride/Milan/Jackson. Thank you.

Joe K.
